item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @titas09 titas09
item.description:
@titas09 wrote:

help.png758×538

my staff of light wears as a helmet how do i changed it so its a weapon i tried looking at item.java couldnt find it so it must be on client side cos every time i add stuff i wear as a helmet.

	case 15001:
		itemDef.actions = new String[5];
		itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 51802;//female
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = -5;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 2;
		itemDef.modelZoom = 1490;
		itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1400;
		itemDef.modelRotation1 = 148;
		itemDef.maleEquip1 = 51800;
		itemDef.modelID = 51799;
		itemDef.name = "Staff of light";
		itemDef.description = "Humming with power.".getBytes();
	break;

HELP?

Read full topic
